attributes.action: Include a "NONE OF THE ABOVE" option on UK voting papers.
attributes.additional_details: We believe that not having the "NONE OF THE ABOVE" option on UK voting papers denies the UK electorate from democratically expressing this choice in elections.
attributes.background: We consider that it is undemocratic not to include the "NONE OF THE ABOVE" option on UK voting papers and that this must be put right as rapidly as possible and preferably before the next general election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Implement "None of the above" on ballots in all United Kingdom elections #NOTAUK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650023
